name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Henry SATCHELL, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Henry SATCHELL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Daniel P. McElhatton, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Kenneth S. Gallant, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1157
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Henry SATCHELL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 24, 1981.
Decided July 2, 1981.
Daniel P. McElhatton, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Kenneth S. Gallant, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
